QuestData.Title: Fine Linen Goods
QuestData.Description: The thugs in Elwynn wear linen which I can use to make fine linen goods.$B$BBring me linen scraps and I'll use them to fashion something for you.$B$BYou'll find those lawless criminals in pockets across Elwynn Forest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring 6 Linen Scraps to Sara Timberlain at the Eastvale Logging Camp.
QuestData.CompletionText: I'm running low on linen, $n. Do you have any for me?
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, these are nice scraps, if a little rough...$B$BHere you are!
